document_data.name: Candlefish
document_data.mainbody: '''Candlefish''' was a species of tiny [[fish]] that inhabited the [[Lake Glorfindar]] in the [[Starmetal Hills]] and remained active through the winter months under the lake's ice.
document_data.Description: These tiny sensuous fishes had reddish-brown scales.
document_data.Ecology: Candlefish got their names from the fact that they were extremely [[oil]]y. So much so when they were dried, candlefishes could be lit to burn like [[candle]]s. They were edible and were a part of a winter's hero's feasts served during the annual [[Simril]] celebration in [[Twilight Tor]]. The feast also consisted of cooked [[brown bream]], [[blackjaw]], and [[durgrace]].
